sections.title: Introduction to Data Visualization
sections.content: Understand the importance of data visualization and its applications in real-world scenarios.

sections.title: Setting up the Environment
sections.content: Install necessary libraries and set up a Python environment for data visualization.

sections.title: Basic Visualization with Matplotlib
sections.content: Create basic visualizations using Matplotlib, including line plots, scatter plots, and bar charts.

sections.title: Advanced Visualization with Seaborn
sections.content: Create advanced visualizations using Seaborn, including heatmaps and box plots.

sections.title: Data Visualization Project
sections.content: Apply data visualization concepts to a real-world project, using a dataset of choice.

sections.title: Project Assessment
sections.content: Assess the project's effectiveness in communicating insights and recommendations.
